name: Aurora Feast
description: Grandma and Vernal feed the dungeon mid-run, spawning feed shrines.
notes: Boosts sustain loops and preps Shaniqua contracts.

name: Dread Carnival
description: Wavii challenges the party to a midnight duel for cosmetics and crit buffs.
notes: Encourages flawless clears before recruiting gun strikers.

name: Voidgreen Auction
description: Secret caravan selling contracts for A1 Kush, Shaniqua, and Modelo.
notes: Primary gold sink; appears more often when players hoard funds.

name: Creator's Eclipse
description: Reality flickers as Jeff inspects the run, offering mythic boons.
